scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run test:coverage
scripts.pre-publish: npm run build && cp package.json target/out/package.json && cp README.md target/out/README.md
scripts.publish:patch: npm run pre-publish && npm version patch && npm publish target/out
scripts.publish:minor: npm run pre-publish && npm version minor && npm publish target/out
scripts.publish:major: npm run pre-publish && npm version major && npm publish target/out
